description: Custom version of the default Cinnamon Menu applet, but infinitely more customizable.
name: Custom Cinnamon Menu
comments: Bug reports, feature requests and contributions should be done on this xlet's repository linked below.
contributors: NikoKrause: Bug fixes and German localization.,Radek71: Czech localization.,lestcape: Author of some advanced features used by this applet.,nooulaif: Fuzzy search feature based on his Sane Menu applet.,Daniel Bruce: Some icons used by this menu are from www.entypo.com.,muzena: Croatian localization.,giwhub: Chinese localization.
